title: [ppc64le] Fix for issue #4103 (remove  -march=native flag for ppc64le)
body_html:
This change is to fix issue #4103
Fails with the following:
test_run_lstm_fusion_cpu (test_jit.TestJit) ... g++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-march=native’
ERROR

The -march=native flag is not recognized in g++ for ppc64le.
The culprit is in torch/csrc/jit/fusion_compiler.cpp line 629

static const std::string compile_string =
""${cxx}" -O3 -g -march=native -std=c++11 -fPIC -shared "${cpp_file}" -o "${so_file}"";

""${cxx}" -O3 -g -march=native -std=c++11 -fPIC -shared "${cpp_file}" -o "${so_file}"";
body:
This change is to fix issue #4103 
Fails with the following:
test_run_lstm_fusion_cpu (test_jit.TestJit) ... g++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-march=native’
ERROR

The -march=native flag is not recognized in g++ for ppc64le.
The culprit is in torch/csrc/jit/fusion_compiler.cpp line 629

static const std::string compile_string =
""${cxx}" -O3 -g -march=native -std=c++11 -fPIC -shared "${cpp_file}" -o "${so_file}"";
